categoryGeneratedIndex.title: Developer documentation
categoryGeneratedIndex.description: At AWS, I worked on documentation for developers that use Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) and AWS Cloud Map. This documentation lives in developer guides. The following samples show how I approached two cross-product integrations and documented them in the Amazon ECS and AWS Cloud Map developer guides, collaborating with cross-team stakeholders along the way.

next.title: Amazon ECS integration with Amazon EBS
